content: Chapter 2 transports the Destined One to the parched deserts of the Yellow Wind Ridge, where a Yellow Wind Sage and his rat army have taken control of the land.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Black Myth: Wukong Walkthrough Sections', specifically from the subsection 'Chapter 2 - Yellow Sand, Desolate Dusk'.
The content is as follows:
Chapter 2 transports the Destined One to the parched deserts of the Yellow Wind Ridge, where a Yellow Wind Sage and his rat army have taken control of the land.
